name: Apocalyptic Commute
description:
Apocalyptic Commute is a game where you try to drive to work despite an apocalypse.

Drag blocks around to build your way across rivers of lava and over massive rock walls.

Controls --

A and D: Strafe left and right respectively

Q: Slow down time (If you use all of your time-slowing power it will take a few seconds before you can use it again)

Left click: Pick up blocks

Right click: Stack blocks
